title: Analyst

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to perform market research on a player, learning their role and framing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, two random good players are secretly marked with Opportunity. No one knows who.
- If you perform market research on a player with Opportunity, you invest in them.
- When a player you invest in dies, you gain 4 Profit.
- When a player with Opportunity dies (and you didn’t invest in them), you’ll be informed.
Item: Fund Sheets
- Cost 1
- Uses 2
- Analyze: Learn a player’s role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
